aka: Pyotr I: Posledniy tsar i pervyy imperator

cast.name: 伊万·科列斯尼科夫 Ivan Kolesnikov
沃尔夫冈·塞尔尼 Wolfgang Cerny
丹尼尔·伊佐托夫 Daniil Izotov
安娜·罗多纳亚 Anna Rodonaya

writer.name: 安德列·克拉夫丘克 Andrey Kravchuk
安德烈·鲁巴诺夫 Andrey Rubanov

director.name: 安德列·克拉夫丘克 Andrey Kravchuk

this_title: Петр I: Последний царь и первый император
trans_title: 彼得一世：沙皇第一大帝
Pyotr I: Posledniy tsar i pervyy imperator
introduction: How to take the throne when you are the fourteenth child in the family? How to win access to the sea when there is no professional army and navy in the country? How in a few decades to bring a country to the world leaders that no one had considered before? These and many other questions are answered by Andrey Kravchuk's documentary-art blockbuster about the formation and reign of Emperor Peter the Great, whose figure still excites the minds of people all over the world.
chinese_title: 彼得一世：沙皇第一大帝
foreign_title: Петр I: Последний царь и первый император
